sqlCreate: CREATE TABLE if not exists USER(UUID NVARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, WORD CHAR(32) NOT NULL, EXPARM NVARCHAR2(6000) ) WITHOUT ROWID;

CREATE TABLE if not exists EVENT(UUID CHAR(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, ID CHAR(32) NOT NULL, TITLE NVARCHAR2(255), allDay BOOLEAN, start NVARCHAR2(500), end NVARCHAR2(500), \
        editable BOOLEAN, finished BOOLEAN, public BOOLEAN, owner NVARCHAR2(20) ) WITHOUT ROWID;
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_event_id] ON [EVENT] ([UUID] DESC);
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_event_start] ON [EVENT] ([start] DESC);
